techmeme.title: Sources: Li Lin, founder of crypto exchange Huobi, and some of Asia's earliest Ethereum backers have raised ~$1B to launch a digital asset trust to buy Ether (Bloomberg)
Dreamdata, which offers a B2B marketing analytics platform, raised a $55M Series B led by PeakSpan, bringing its total funding to $67M (Mary Ann Azevedo/Crunchbase News)
Sources: Suno is in talks to raise $100M+ at a $2B+ valuation, quadrupling its previous valuation; it raised $125M in 2024 and is generating $100M+ in ARR (Bloomberg)
Marc Benioff apologizes for saying Trump should send the National Guard to SF, says the comments were made out of "an abundance of caution" around Dreamforce (Ari Levy/CNBC)
Nvidia and TSMC unveil the first Blackwell chip wafer made in the US, which will eventually become Blackwell chips (Megan Morrone/Axios)
